Question
========
When considering the occurrences of tornadoes across Europe, which type of spatial data (point-referenced, point pattern or lattice/areal data) are mostly likely working with?

Answerlist
----------
		
* Point-referenced
* Point pattern
* Lattice/areal

Solution
========

The locations at which tornadoes occur are unknown/random and thus we will likely have point pattern data.
